title: LLM Contextizer
description:
Zero-dependency CLI for generating LLM-ready repository contexts.

The tool emits a deterministic ASCII project tree followed by concatenated file contents, optimized for LLM context windows. It includes sensible defaults for noise filtering, truncation of log-like files, and protection against stdout self-inclusion when redirecting output to a file inside the scanned root.
notes: Zenodo DOI will be minted for an immutable GitHub release tag (e.g., v0.1.1).
